topic.title: 친구를 위한 서프라이즈 파티 계획하기
topic.description: 친구의 생일을 맞아 서프라이즈 파티를 계획하는 상황에 대한 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 1. 이번 주 토요일이 민준이 생일인 거 알아?
2. 응, 당연히 알지. 우리 서프라이즈 파티를 열어주는 거 어때?
3. 좋은 생각이야! 그가 정말 좋아할 거야.
4. 우선, 누구를 초대할지 명단을 만들어야 해.
5. 알았어. 내가 그의 친한 친구들 몇 명에게 연락해 볼게.
8. 우리 집이 괜찮을 것 같아. 공간이 충분해.
9. 완벽해! 그럼 내가 사람들에게 음식을 좀 가져오라고 부탁할게.
10. 가장 중요한 건, 민준이에게 비밀로 해야 한다는 거야.
11. 물론이지! 그가 아무것도 눈치채지 못하게 하자.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: 1. Do you know it's Minjun's birthday this Saturday?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: 1. Do you know | it's Minjun's birthday | this Saturday?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: 2. Yes, of course. How about we throw him a surprise party?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: 2. Yes, | of course. || How about we throw him | a surprise party?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: 3. That's a great idea! He would really love that.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: 3. That's a great idea! || He would really love that.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: 4. First, we need to make a guest list.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: 4. First, | we need to make | a guest list.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: 5. Okay. I'll contact some of his close friends.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: 5. Okay. || I'll contact | some of his close friends.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: 6. I'll look into the cake and decorations.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: 6. I'll look into | the cake and decorations.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: 7. Where should we have the party?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: 7. Where should we have | the party?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: 8. I think my place would be good. There's enough space.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: 8. I think my place | would be good. || There's enough space.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: 9. Perfect! Then I'll ask people to bring some food.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: 9. Perfect! || Then I'll ask people | to bring some food.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: 10. The most important thing is that we have to keep it a secret from Minjun.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: 10. The most important thing is | that we have to keep it a secret | from Minjun.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: 11. Of course! Let's make sure he doesn't notice anything.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: 11. Of course! || Let's make sure | he doesn't notice anything.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: 12. Great, see you on Saturday then!
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: 12. Great, | see you on Saturday | then!

The most important thing is that we have to keep it a secret from Minjun.

highlight_sentences.korean_text: 가장 중요한 건, 민준이에게 비밀로 해야 한다는 거야
highlight_sentences.foreign_text: The most important thing is that we have to keep it a secret from Minjun
highlight_sentences.reason: 서프라이즈 파티의 성공을 위해 가장 핵심적인 '비밀 유지'의 중요성을 강조하는 문장입니다.
